channel.title: Lol at this community
channel.description: I have been gone for a week and I am in a pretty good mood. I met a girl I liked and we are hanging out alot. Anyways when your in a good mood for a long time your perspective of things change. My opinion is that this site is full of complete retards. All you do is try to flame or yell at people. Although this is pretty funny and I am laughing my ass off right now... It is still stupid. Basically, there are 2 groups, the first group contains the elitist and the second group contains the wan-to-be elitist. This is what makes it so funny. The want-to-be just follow the example the elitist follow and since the elitist are complete retards it is killing the community. BTW have fun spamming the shit out of this because I probably won't read it for some time.

item.title: Lol at this community
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

The elitists keep the site alive. It would be an even bigger mess without them…

This site (mitb, not moparscape) would never have been successful if the elitists never came here. If we werent here, it would be exactly like moparscape. Oh and btw we get threads like this every week. 2 of them this week tbh.

By the sounds of it, this site was your entire reality until you stepped outside for a bit. Kinda sad tbh.
